categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems
Category:Darth Revan's Sith Empire star systems

nodes.text: The Allanteen system was a star system located within the Tynna sector of the Expansion Region of the galaxy at the intersection of the Corellian Run and the Shipwrights' Trace. Circa 3956 BBY, the Battle of Allanteen erupted in the system. During the Clone Wars, it contained a shipyard which was used by Anakin Skywalker to modify his Venator-class Star Destroyers.
The system was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion of the galaxy.
